title: Payment not processing, consumer not impressed.
body:
Riot, please hear me out here and I honestly hope you care about your players enough to address and try to solve this problem. 

I just purchased $10 RP through Paypal and clicked pay now and that's as far as I've gotten, the animated loading circle has been going without fault nor freeze for 10 minutes now, I've purchased RP before and this process has been almost instant. I'm not sure whether it's server traffic that's causing such a wait, or whether some times it just takes this long. 

I will not close the window as instructed until I get a reply, within reason I'm not going to wait for hours on end, and I hope some correspondence with a mod comes soon. 

Thanks Riot in advance. 

P.S
I can add screenshots with timestamps for proof if need be :)

EDIT: the only problem I have with this is that Paypal will still charge me for the transaction if i close the window so if that isn't the case then that's all that needs to be said.

replies.body:
Do not come here for a quick response. It never happens.

I presume you have since closed the window. Did you ever get your RP? Was your account charged?
